### Create Plots in ggplot

Use the file `Middle-Class-US-Metro-Areas-5-12-16-Supplementary-Tables.xslx` from [Pew Research on Americaâ€™s shrinking middle class](https://www.pewsocialtrends.org/2016/05/11/americas-shrinking-middle-class-a-close-look-at-changes-within-metropolitan-areas/){target="_blank"} to create at least 5 comparisons based on at the data set. 

Please post a single script to  [`##wk3-shrinking-middle-class`](https://2021edp693e.slack.com/archives/C01MB8CN6D9){target="_blank"}

*NOTE: You will have to clean up the data but do not have to do it in R.*

```{r echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE}
downloadthis::download_file(
  path = here::here("static", "data", "Middle-Class-US-Metro-Areas-5-12-16-Supplementary-Tables.xlsx"),
  output_name = "Middle-Class-US-Metro-Areas-5-12-16-Supplementary-Tables",
  button_label = "Download the Data",
  button_type = "default",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  class = "hvr-sweep-to-left"
  )
```
